description: FieldView Drive not connecting to equipment CAN bus
recommended_action: Verify correct CAN port on equipment - check cable for damage - restart Drive and equipment

description: FieldView Drive losing cellular connection in field
recommended_action: Check cellular coverage in area - data buffers locally and syncs later - verify data plan active

description: Planting data incomplete - missing rows or sections
recommended_action: Verify CAN bus connection stable - check planter monitor outputting ISO data - restart Drive

description: Harvest yield data not recording from combine
recommended_action: Confirm combine yield monitor is outputting CAN data - check Drive firmware - verify combine compatibility

description: Field Health satellite imagery outdated or cloudy
affected_products: R7 Field Monitoring / Field Health Imagery
recommended_action: Normal during cloudy periods - imagery updates depend on clear satellite passes - check for recent passes

description: Yield Analysis maps showing stripe artifacts
recommended_action: Apply data cleaning filters in Yield Analysis tool - remove combine header-up passes - calibrate yield monitor

description: Seed Advisor VRS prescription not loading to planter
recommended_action: Export prescription as shapefile - load via USB if wireless fails - verify planter monitor compatibility

description: FieldView Cab App crashing on iPad during operation
recommended_action: Update app to latest version - restart iPad - clear app cache - ensure iOS version supported

description: Industry Connect not syncing with JD Operations Center
recommended_action: Re-authorize connection in FieldView settings - verify JD Operations Center account linked

description: Industry Connect data mismatch with Trimble Ag Software
recommended_action: Check field boundary alignment between platforms - verify coordinate systems match

description: FieldView account showing wrong acreage or fields
recommended_action: Verify field boundaries in account - contact support for acreage corrections - re-draw boundaries

description: Large farm data taking hours to sync to cloud
recommended_action: Use WiFi instead of cellular for large uploads - sync overnight - verify no duplicate fields
